title: Manage an Aircraft Turnaround
description: A ramp supervisor must coordinate all ground activities to ensure an aircraft departs on time.

tasks.description: Confirm that the aircraft has been parked and chocked upon arrival.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the aircraft is secure.

tasks.description: Coordinate the fueling, catering, and baggage loading teams to service the aircraft simultaneously.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures all ground servicing tasks are happening in parallel.

tasks.description: Authorize the aircraft pushback once all doors are closed and the ground crew is clear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the final clearance for pushback.
